column5: I have an older sears/Rca tv. the problem that i have is that the picture seems to big for the tv, I have tried to go through the settings to no avail, any ideas?
My guess  ... time for a new one -  52 inch plasma would work  nicely !
Do you have High Def? If so it's only meant for 1080 I or P click and read the link Below, hope it helps you out.  http://www.dslreports.com/forum/r21114341-...seems-zoomed-in
